author: Rashaan Ayesh
title: Global coronavirus crisis leaves refugees vulnerable
description: For millions of refugees and displaced people, access to health care is limited and social distancing is impossible. Why it matters: Public health experts view a major outbreak in a refugee camp as a worst-case scenario in the global coronavirus crisis. Zoom …
content:
For millions of refugees and displaced people, access to health care is limited and social distancing is impossible.
